backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference list summarizing many frontend files and their roles in the simulator.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global style sheet defining color variables and base theming.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the FlightSimView component as the app root.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, storage, and lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder module for potential data fetching hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind styles with aviation-themed palette and HUD component classes.
frontend/src/lib/googleMapsConfig.ts: Empty module placeholder for Google Maps config utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React, sets up providers, and mounts the app.
frontend/src/sim/camera/ChaseCameraRig.t: Smooth chase camera that follows a target group with offset and look-at logic.
frontend/src/sim/controls/useFlightContr: Hook that tracks keyboard input and outputs normalized pitch, roll, yaw, and throttle values updated every 16ms.
frontend/src/sim/FlightSimView.tsx: Main simulator view wiring Canvas, scene, HUD, and UI overlays to sim state.
frontend/src/sim/hud/FlightHUD.tsx: Renders on‑screen HUD panels showing speed, altitude, heading, throttle, and position from the sim state.
frontend/src/sim/hud/format.ts: Provides small formatting helpers for speed, altitude, heading, throttle, and latitude/longitude display.
frontend/src/sim/maps/googleMaps.ts: Empty placeholder for Google Maps integration.
frontend/src/sim/maps/useMapTexture.ts: Empty placeholder hook for map texture handling.
frontend/src/sim/physics/useSimpleFlight: Implements a simple physics model updating aircraft movement, rotation, throttle, and geolocation each frame.
frontend/src/sim/scene/FlightScene.tsx: Three.js scene combining controls, physics, plane model, procedural world, and chase camera.
frontend/src/sim/scene/MapGround.tsx: Empty placeholder for map‑based ground rendering.
frontend/src/sim/scene/ProceduralWorld.t: Manages loading, generating, and disposing terrain and building chunks around the aircraft based on position and seed.
frontend/src/sim/state/types.ts: Defines the SimState interface for aircraft physics, world position, and procedural seed values.
frontend/src/sim/state/useSimState.ts: Hook managing sim state, run/reset controls, and random world seed generation.
frontend/src/sim/ui/SimControlsBar.tsx: UI bar showing control instructions and a reset button.
frontend/src/sim/ui/StartOverlay.tsx: Start screen overlay with controls guide and button to begin the simulation.
frontend/src/sim/world/buildings.ts: Generates deterministic building instances per terrain chunk using seeded randomness and creates Three.js meshes for them.
frontend/src/sim/world/noise.ts: Implements basic 2D value noise and FBM functions used for terrain height generation.
frontend/src/sim/world/prng.ts: Provides a seeded pseudo-random generator and a coordinate hashing function for deterministic world generation.
frontend/src/sim/world/terrain.ts: Generates terrain chunk meshes using FBM noise, applies height-based vertex coloring, and exposes helpers for chunk keys and height sampling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the app’s UI styling.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s metadata, feature list, and procedural-world simulation context for the 3D flight app.
